title: Introducing: Troves
content:
More Lykke Li than London Grammar in truth, yet given the colossal recent success of the latter, you can guarantee which act Brighton trio Troves are more likely to receive comparisons to, especially with todays new release.

With two tracks to their name so far, the upbeat, synth-pop of debut track Youth In Decay and the more melancholic, pensive Afterthought, it’s not difficult to see why they’ve been receiving rave reviews across the blogs so far. Check out both below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
